C_Cpp.clang_format_style: {AlwaysBreakTemplateDeclarations: Yes, BreakBeforeBraces: Custom, BraceWrapping: {BeforeElse: true},SeparateDefinitionBlocks: Always,KeepEmptyLinesAtTheStartOfBlocks: false, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: None, AllowShortCaseLabelsOnASingleLine: true,  IndentCaseLabels: true}
